AbbreviationDictionary - Class in shef.mt.tools.mqm.resources
monolingual abbreviation dictionary current english resource is from http://public.oed.com/how-to-use-the-oed/abbreviations/ TODO: combine with other resources like http://www.indiana.edu/~letrs/help-services/QuickGuides/oed-abbr.html
